summary: I was so happy because of Sope n Namjin breathing in Run BTS then I got happier bc of Eatjin live now I'm sad bc of Odeng but...
body:
I was so happy because of Sope n Namjin breathing in Run BTS then I got happier bc of Eatjin live now I’m sad bc of Odeng but then Kookie tweeted so I’m quite happy again

I need to work on my emotional dependence on BTS

summary: Ohh do your mutuals as BTS members pleeease ToT 💜❤💖
question: Ohh do your mutuals as BTS members pleeease ToT 💜❤💖
answer:
Okay let’s go…

@jacksnschild is Tae. Sofi is a boss ass bitch and does not give af what any one thinks, she’s a fucking crack head but so caring and will always hype me up. I love that hoe

@jungkooooooookie is Jungkook (mainly cos she’s a foetus compared to me) but she’s hilarious. She gets SHOOK AF and has no idea what’s going on half the time and if that’s not Jungkook Idk what is.

@btsreactionmemes is Jin. She’s super funny and so caring, and she just radiates a hugely positive energy and I love that

@nyxqueenofshadows is Yoongi. She’s quite reserved, super caring, but can also be really funny.

( @kingparkjinyoung @straykidsmagicshop @i-need-u-sweet-lullaby and @submissive-bangtan I wanna get to know you more pls cos I love all your blogs)

This was hard and as you can see I only have 4 mutuals that I talk to on a regular basis, but just know I love them all💗💗

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonseok
blog.title: Hwagae Market
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jung Hoseok|J-Hope/Min Yoongi|Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: Forever City
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FcClag

by PeppermintCodes

Jung Hoseok’s smile was the last thing you saw if you fucked up in his territory. Those were the words whispered on the streets, murmured past sticky lips in the bars. But it wasn’t strictly true, Taehyung mused as he lay bound on a hardwood floor. Jung Hoseok was so much more-

Pain erupted over Taehyung’s back in splitting lines, his body convulsing helplessly. All he could do was drool as the figure loomed over him. His Hope, his salvation.

“More,” he whined.

or: Jimin had two problems, the rent soon to be due that he could not foreseeably pay, and his ex. In desperation and by recommendation from his hot dance captain, he applied for a job working in a club. He found out that his new boss and owner of said club was not only his dance captain but also the ruthless gang leader ironically known as Hope who controlled the entire district he lived in and now his whole livelihood.
Maybe that was the last straw for Jimin’s sanity, or maybe it was finding out that his ex boyfriend had intended to traffic him. But either way, becoming the target of a rival gang and fighting his attraction for a dangerous Kingpin was never where he expected his life to go, but well, here he is.

Words: 4734, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

Idol Movie Posters and Book Covers!

I am just uploading my faves to put on the masterlist and will be doing these again soon.

(If you see this and wanna be ahead of the crowd, just submit an HD pic of an idol to me. You can also give me a genre. If no genre is given, then I’ll choose for myself.)

summary: 🙄🙄 ARMY keep giving the pre-order for the new album on Amazon 1 star reviews saying it's fake and that we should all follow the...
body:
🙄🙄 ARMY keep giving the pre-order for the new album on Amazon 1 star reviews saying it’s fake and that we should all follow the link posted by Big Hit.

I don’t think they realize that if you click the link posted on their Twitter, it will take you to the pre-order that they’re claiming is fake.

Now the album, that hasn’t even been released, has 5 one star reviews. 🙄🙄
